reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars For me personally
reviews.reviewText: This stuff works. But that's for me. EVERYONE IS DIFFERENT. So don't get upset if it doesn't work for you. But I use this every day. Shower, before bed, before work. I love it and my skin had cleared up tremendously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face product
reviews.reviewText: Use it alone with the face toner, night lotion, face gel, the lotion for black mark at least twice a day ,you will have a radiant ,glowing,beautiful face, as a flight attendant I care about how my face looks and I wish my fellow crew who told me about DIFFERING, wish I met her a long time ago because this stuff works and the price is right, I try so many other product/// clinic,Neutrogena , Aveeno, this is really IT and I’m done searching I found what I was looking for. CONSISTENCY is key if you want to see result be patient. The only one I’m missing now in the body wash and I’m looking forward to add it into the regimen. I’m so in love.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars THE BEST, Skin Life Saver!
reviews.reviewText: This products has worked wonders for me! Since about 2 years ago I WAS struggling with severe cystic acne. My face was always red and in pain. About a couple of months with horrible cystic acne I discovered DIFFERIN. I tried so many other brands and they seemed to make my skin worse even if I followed their instruction and bought all their products for acne. When I started using Differin I finally found THE product. I started with the adapalene gel and noticed a difference, after a few weeks I seen my skin getting worse. I was so disappointed but I read the FAQ and saw that it said it might worsen before it gets better. I continued using it. I seen they had a cleanser, the daily deep cleanser. So I started using it with the gel and it was amazing. After a YEAR of cystic acne I seen a CHANGE. I am so happy with my facial skin now. At the moment I began to get cystic acne in my chin again but I stopped using the products for a while because I felt better from my face. Learned my lesson, I will continue to use. I feel confident to say that these products work miracles. If you are suffering from cystic acne get the daily deep cleanse and the adapalene gel and use them, if you see it worsen go though it and continue. Don’t stop. You WILL be happy with your results.To add to this I do have bad scarring in my face from all the cystic acne and I seen they have a resurfacing cream so I am going to try that out. I hope I will see wonders like I did with these products.Thank you for reading my review. I know it’s long but if you read all of it, Thank you. I hope your skin gets better soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2019
reviews.reviewText: Differin Acne Cleanser is one of the best facial treatments that I've used. I've had acne since I was about 13, and I'm 18 now. Throughout those five years, I have used alcohol-based cleansing pads, Proactive, and just regular hand soap products, none of which achieve the success of Differin. I have been using Differin Acne Cleansing for about a year now, and although it took my skin a couple of days to make the switch from different products, this treatment has decreased the number of breakouts I used to have, the redness in my face, and has just overall improved my skin.Differin Acne Cleanser is a Benzoyl Peroxide-based acne treatment, which is known to be one of the better products to use when treating acne, blemishes, and breakouts. When buying an acne treatment people tend to pay attention to the cost, smell, and effect. Differin is fairly cheap for what it can do. I buy my product from Walmart, and it costs me about $11.00, but each bottle can last up to a month. It also has no smell and is very effective for people with oily skin because it has a Benzoyl Peroxide-base, in which it dries out the excessive oil that causes breakouts and blemishes.This product has two counterparts: the Differin Moisturizer and the Differin Gel. The moisturizer is to help moisturize your skin, that way your oil glands don't over excrete to do the same task. This product costs about the same as the cleanser, and it lasts a long time, as I use it twice a day and it has lasted me about four months so far. The gel is an after-treatment that you only use once a day after your face is clean, and it just helps with preventing bad breaks outs. This one can be a little expensive as it is a little bottle and costs about $15.00. Although the Differin cleanser works best with the other two products, it still works great alone. If you use it twice a day, every day, it will do its job in decreasing your acne breakouts and blemishes.Some other reviewers argued that it dries their faces out or it's not effective for sensitive skin. Although everybody's skin is different, and that may have been their skin’s reaction, there are ways around these issues with this product. Since Differin is a cleanser that is meant to dry and decrease the oil from your face, it has the ability to dry your face out completely. To avoid this, be sure to only use it once or twice a day, and I would even recommend investing in the Differin Moisturizer.Overall, Differin Acne Cleanser is a great product for people with acne. It is very cost-effective, has no odor, and even provides loopholes and solutions for those having trouble using this product in the beginning. For me personally, I would recommend Differin Acne Cleanser for an over-the-counter solution, as I have been using it for a year and it has yet to let me down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars love it for my acne but it did leave me itchy at times
reviews.reviewText: i really like that it has 5% benzoyl peroxide and i could definitely see the effect of that as it did help with my acne. i love differin but for some odd reason this often times left my skin rather itchy. i did end up finishing the tube so the itching was not unbearable and like i mentioned it did help with the acne but i think there are better products more suitable for my skin out there. very sad that this wasn’t the best fit bc i love this brand!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product! Buy it with gel and night moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have Rosacea and Sebbhoreic Dermatitis - an inflammatory response to EXTREME stress (my best friend passed away suddenly 3 months ago) because I have several auto-immune conditions. I have redness on cheeks and white flaky patches on my face caused by a fungus that is not contagious. My doc told me Differin was OTC now and I needed a face cleanser with Benzoyl Peroxide, Differin gel with Retinol, a good non-oily night-time moisturizer, and a good non-oily daytime moisturizer with a sunscreen of SPF 30 or higher. He also wants me to wear a hat with a big brim to protect my face. So, I came home and was happy to see I could order all of these Differin products. I started using them 4 days ago. The cleanser was great, the gel seems to be working, the night moisturizer is fabulous, too. The only product I don't recommend is the sunscreen. Read my review on that product page. I highly recommend this particular product, though!

reviews.reviewerName: Defective packaging and probably productDefective packaging and probably product
reviews.reviewTitle: Defective packaging and probably contaminated product
reviews.reviewText: The item came unsealed, with defective packaging (see photos). The box was torn, deformed, and the bottle itself had no seal. The nozzle wasn’t clean, smudged already with the product. So, not sure if it was contaminated or not.
